feed.title: Shinobi Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Shinobi: ocean-1
entry.content:
Major Changes since 2020-04-11

  • Cleaner PTZ Control UI
  • Automatic PTZ can now return home when target is lost (ONVIF cameras only)
  • Updated PTZ backend functions
  • Updated ONVIF backend functions
  • Rebuilt database usage with Knex to allow easily using other databases like PostgreSQL
  • CustomAutoLoad UI added in Superuser panel
  • Updated TensorFlow Object Detection Plugin
  • Support for getting configurations from ShinobiHub in the dashboard
  • Added Face Manager for Face Recognition Plugin
  • Add option useOldPowerVideo usable in conf.json. Boolean value. Default is false.
  • Add ARM support for TensorFlow.js-based plugins

entry.title: New release for Shinobi: ocean-1.2
entry.content:
• Fix Superuser Penetration Bug (Bug found by Marco Rieger @ins0) - CVE-2021-27228
  • Update API Key Manager
  • Update Sub-Account Manager (move to regular dashboard, deprecate /admin)
  • Update Face plugin to use tfjs 1.7.4
  • Fix PTZ Turn Speed
  • FFmpeg string generation fixes
  • Fix cron.js script
  • Update Coral Installer (by Mitch Ross @mitchross1)
  • Fix Bounding Box Logic (by Mitch Ross @mitchross1)

entry.title: New release for Shinobi: ocean-1.2b
entry.content: Additional Fix for cron.js when deleting old videos with a specific day count per monitor.

entry.title: New release for Shinobi: A Heroes Walk v3.0.0
New release for Shinobi: The Last Dashboard v2 Build
entry.content: We are nearly ready to merge Dashboard v3 (and much more) to the master branch. This release is to preserve the last Dashboard v2 build.
